jd: From: Mohit Kumar, Tek Inspirations kumar.mohit@tekinspirations.com Reply to: kumar.mohit@tekinspirations.com Project Manager (D365 Implementation / Migration) Location: Addison, TX 75001 (2-3 days onsite per week)JOB SUMMARYcurrently seeking a Project Manager (D365 Implementation / Migration) for a 6M C2H located in Addison, TX 75001 (2-3 days onsite per week). The Project Manager (D365 Implementation / Migration) will lead, oversee, and ensure the successful delivery and management of multiple enterprise software implementation projects that involves dynamic change management for successful project delivery. The Project Manager (D365 Implementation / Migration) will possess a strong understanding of Enterprise Business Applications (ERP / CRM / HCM) and SCRUM / Agile principals and practices. The Project Manager (D365 Implementation / Migration) will work with, drive change, and support cross-functional teams (Software Developers / BAs / Stakeholders, etc.) to implement and enhance business applications implementing and utilizing the Agile framework. Identify / Schedule Project Deliverables / Milestones / Tasks, etc.Lead / Motivate the Project Teams Throughout the Project LifecycleFormally / Informally Collaborate Closely with Internal / External Project ManagersPerform Risk Assessments / Implement Migration PlansFacilitate Translation of Business Needs into Functional Requirements / Transition Business Requirements to Solution Delivery Team - Ensuring Clear / Complete Understanding of RequirementsEffectively Manage Organizational Change / Training / Testing / Data Migration / Cutover, etc.Implement Project Plans / Conduct Weekly Status/Stakeholder Meetings with Business Customers / Prepare/Present Status ReportsAlign with Internal Audit Team to Ensure All Required Documentation is GatheredMonitor Project Activities - Ensure Currency / Quality / Integrity | Providing Look/Feel Content Consistency Across the EnterpriseEnsure Project Goals are Accomplished / Align with Business ObjectivesDirect / Coordinate Project Team Activities - Ensuring Project Progresses on Schedule / Within BudgetEstablish Standards / Procedures for Project Reporting / DocumentationContinuously Benchmark PM Performance - Identify Improvements / Achieve Higher Capability in Project / Portfolio ManagementCoach Teams to Facilitate Adoption of / Improvement in Agile Methodologies - Ensuring Adoption of Standards/Best Practices for Agile | Facilitate Sprint / Release Planning Sessions / Agile CeremoniesChallenge Existing Workflows / Processes -
